topics.title: Expressing Happiness
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you felt very happy. What happened and how did you show your happiness?
topics.hint: 請描述一件讓你感到很快樂的事情，可以說明當時的情況和你的表現方式。建議講3-5句。
topics.sample: Last week, I got a good grade on my exam. I felt very happy and I smiled a lot. I also told my friends about it and clapped my hands.

topics.title: Daily Routines with Emotions
topics.prompt: Talk about your daily routine and when you usually feel happy during the day.
topics.hint: 描述你平常一天的生活，並說明你通常在哪些時候感到快樂。可以包含早上、學校或晚上等時間點。
topics.sample: In the morning, I usually feel happy when I have breakfast with my family. At school, I am happy during recess because I play with my friends. At night, I feel happy when I read my favorite book.

topics.title: How to Cheer Up
topics.prompt: What do you do when you feel sad to make yourself happy again?
topics.hint: 講述當你覺得難過時，你會做什麼來讓自己快樂起來。可以說出2-3個方法。
topics.sample: When I feel sad, I listen to cheerful music. Sometimes, I watch a funny movie or play games with my friends. These things make me happy again.

topics.title: Favorite Happy Song
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite happy song and explain why you like it.
topics.hint: 介紹你喜歡的快樂歌曲，並說明為什麼喜歡它。可以提到歌曲的節奏、歌詞或讓你想到的事情。
topics.sample: My favorite happy song is very catchy and has a strong beat. It makes me want to dance and smile. The lyrics are about enjoying life and being positive.

topics.title: Actions When Happy
topics.prompt: What gestures do you do when you feel happy? Describe them.
topics.hint: 說說當你感到快樂時會做什麼動作或表情，例如拍手、笑容等。建議描述2-4個動作。
topics.sample: When I am happy, I usually clap my hands and smile. Sometimes I jump up and down or hug my friends. These actions show my happiness.

topics.title: Importance of Napping
topics.prompt: Explain why taking a nap can make you feel better and happier.
topics.hint: 說明午睡為什麼會讓你覺得精神好、心情愉快。可談談休息的重要性。
topics.sample: Taking a nap helps me rest when I am tired. After a short sleep, I feel more energetic and happy. It also helps me concentrate better in the afternoon.

topics.title: Describe a Happy Place
topics.prompt: Describe a place where you feel happy and relaxed. What do you see and hear there?
topics.hint: 描述一個讓你感到快樂和放鬆的地方，可以提到環境的樣子和聲音。建議說3-5句。
topics.sample: My happy place is the park near my house. I see green trees and colorful flowers there. I hear birds singing and children playing. It makes me feel calm and joyful.

topics.title: Role of Music in Happiness
topics.prompt: How does music affect your mood? Give examples of songs that make you happy.
topics.hint: 說說音樂如何影響你的心情，並舉例會讓你快樂的歌曲。可以說2-3句。
topics.sample: Music can change my mood quickly. When I listen to happy songs, I feel more cheerful and excited. Songs with fast beats and positive lyrics make me smile.

topics.title: Share a Happy Memory
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about a happy memory from your childhood.
topics.hint: 分享一個你童年時期的快樂回憶。盡量用簡短故事敘述，約3-5句。
topics.sample: When I was a child, I went to the beach with my family. We played in the sand and ate ice cream. I felt very happy because we spent time together.

topics.title: Describe a Happy Celebration
topics.prompt: Talk about a happy celebration or event you attended recently.
topics.hint: 描述你最近參加過的一個快樂的慶祝活動或事件。可以說活動內容和你的感受。
topics.sample: Last month, I went to my friend's birthday party. We played games, ate cake, and sang songs. I was very happy because everyone was smiling and having fun.
